thread.title: Rick Ross Reveals Upcoming Collab With Nas
thread.title_full: Rick Ross Reveals Upcoming Collab With Nas

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Rick Ross Reveals Upcoming Collab With Nas
text:
Home > Music > Rick Ross Reveals Upcoming Collab With Nas Rick Ross Reveals Upcoming Collab With Nas 1 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Feb 15, 2017 at 05:42pm Nas will appear on "Rather You Than Me." 
Early this morning, Rick Ross revealed that he will release his ninth studio album Rather You Than Me on March 17th . In a new interview with Angie Martinez, Ross shared another juicy bit of information: Nas will make an appearance on the album. 
“I’mma say it ’cause you Angie Martinez, but Nas is definitely [on the album],” Ross said. 
He explained that he developed a newfound appreciation for Nas when Nas called him one of the hip hop's best five lyricists. Rozay has previously invited Nas to appear on "Triple Beam Dreams" and "One Of Us."
